ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# Copyright (c) 1993-2009 Microsoft Corp."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# This is a sample HOSTS file used by Microsoft TCP/IP for Windows."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# This file contains the mappings of IP addresses to host names. Each"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# entry should be kept on an individual line. The IP address should"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# be placed in the first column followed by the corresponding host name."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# The IP address and the host name should be separated by at least one"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# space."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# Additionally, comments (such as these) may be inserted on individual"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# lines or following the machine name denoted by a '#' symbol."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# For example:"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#      102.54.94.97     rhino.acme.com          # source server"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#       38.25.63.10     x.acme.com              # x client host"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value=""
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="# localhost name resolution is handled within DNS itself."
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#	127.0.0.1       localhost"
ParameterBinding(Out-Default): name="InputObject"; value="#	::1             localhost"
